info.label: Your Profession
info.brief: A brief description of yourself as a candidate, with or without **Markdown** and/or HTML formatting.

history.summary: Worked on the South Mountain Mine project as an assitant surveyor and sample collector.
highlights: Started as an assistant land surveyor and soon lead my own surveying teams in the field.
Created a linar-correlation study on rock assay results, leading to the discovery of three specific periods of mineralization.
Was responsible for the organization, storage, and documentation of 5000 ft of rock core and other samples.

history.summary: Worked as a Barista in a busy coffee shop.
highlights: Often worked alone from opening until close in a busy coffee house along the freeway.
Responsible for positively interacting with customers, making drinks and food quickly and accurately, and accurate operation of the till.
Developed a positive reputation among customers and recived several favorable [reviews.](http://www.yelp.com/biz/skinners-rockhouse-coffee-jordan-valley)
